name: companies_id_financials
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool german_company_data_v2.
Tool description: Enrich your CRM / MAS / ERP system with credible data about all incorporated companies from  Germany.
API description: This endpoint returns the financial key figures (balance sheet total, revenue, profit, number of employees) for the company with the given identifier. For each key figure the endpoint returns a list of values associated with the corresponding year.

is_id.description: The identifier of the company for which financial data is to be retrieved.
